title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1907/93 of 14 July 1993 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products falling within CN code 2817 00 00, originating in China, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90 apply
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1907/93 of 14 July 1993 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products falling within CN code 2817 00 00, originating in China, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation  (EEC) No 3831/90 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: As from 19 July 1993, the levying of customs duties, suspended for 1993 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90, shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products, originating in China:

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 1993.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 396, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
